Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 233,090Chapters: 18/46Kudos: 115

entry.title: Lay My Curses Out to Rest
entry.summary:
Author: sponfawn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,506Chapters: 3/14Kudos: 38

Summary: "Are you there, God? It's me, Stiles. Look, I know I never really went to Mass or anything like a good Polish kid but could you do me a big one and have this whole thing be entirely Not related to the supernatural - hell, it could be super cartel related but no shapeshifters, or chaos spirits, or fear monsters, or deranged Hunters, or fucking human sacrifices of any kind. Just do this for once and I'll do whatever. Well, not whatever, but I dunno I'll be a good son. You like that “honor thy father” stuff, right? I'll honor the fuck out of my dad, even come to visit more often! Confucius will weep at the intensity of my filial piety. Deal? Just. PLEASE."It's 2027 - a decade since Stiles was last in Beacon Hills - and the FBI has sent Stiles back to investigate a smuggling case.ORIn which I attempt to write the kind of story I want to read. A future Sterek fic that: 1) is in character, 2) doesn't bash any characters, 3) fixes Davis' timeline, 4) doesn't have sex, 5) has some character interactions that don't just revolve around Sterek/Stiles/Derek, and 6) addresses Derek and Stiles' unique traumas.

entry.title: Just Kids, Once
entry.summary:
Author: hubrys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,672Chapters: 8/13Kudos: 123

Summary: “You left. Just like that. No goodbyes. No nothing.”“Stiles, I—”“Don’t. You walked away, Derek. After everything. I needed you to stay.”“I didn’t know how.”“You weren’t the first to go. Maybe just the one I hoped wouldn’t.”_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________They grew up clinging to each other in a house that promised nothing. Years later, Stiles dances in a cage and Derek’s about to get married. Some stories don’t start with love. Some start when everything else has already fallen apart.

entry.title: Stiles vs. Vam-Wolf Science
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,027Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: Stiles just wanted to know what would happen if a vampire bit a werewolf.Cue an evening of chaotic theorizing, eye rolls from Derek, thinly veiled murder threats from Peter, and Isabelle laughing through the madness. Somewhere between vampire goo, blood-soaked towels, and unsolicited Blade comparisons, Beacon Hills’ supernatural disaster crew debates the finer points of vam-wolf hybrid biology. No one is safe. Least of all Stiles’ dignity.

entry.title: Run

Author: Ivy Posion (viletty)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,737Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 22

Summary: She ran.She ran from her past, from her present and hopefully her future. Hoping beyond all hell that the darkness inside her didn't consume her. entry.title: Yeah, That's Totally My Bad, Dude
entry.summary:
Author: 0racle_of_bast

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,153Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 16

Summary: Chloroform burned like a bitch. She wished she could claim she came to like flipping on a light switch, like a cool Lara Croft gasp and immediate plan for escape. Pressure pounded behind her temples as her stomach rolled. Her ribs twinged at an unconscious shift. She figured that was how she’d woken up in the first place. She wanted to be Lara Croft, but no, no escape plan because her body hurt, and chloroform burned like a bitch.__________________________________________________________I've been reading way too much TW fanfic and now we have female!Stiles with magic because I say so :)

entry.title: Shattered and Bound
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,987Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 257

Summary: After losing Derek and his father to a feral Scott in the aftermath of the Nogitsune, a shattered Stiles kills his former best friend and is left drowning in guilt and grief.Unable to live in a world where everyone he loves is gone, he casts a one way time travel spell meant to rewrite it all - only to wake up years earlier than expected, in a peaceful dimension where he never existed and the Hales are still alive.Haunted by trauma and drawn to a younger, unbroken Derek, Stiles must navigate healing, fate, and love in a world that was never meant to be his.

entry.title: Bedtime Books and Brews
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,160Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 72

Summary: Loud neighbors made it impossible for Derek to write in his own apartment. Thankfully he found Bedtime Books and Brews, an all night bookstore and coffee shop, and its owner, Stiles StilinskiStiles off-handedly mentions his fantasy world that he daydreams about. Derek uses it as an excuse to talk to Stiles. Eventually he falls in love with the fantasy world because it’s just so Stiles so he starts taking notes about Stiles’s ramblings. Sometimes he’ll come in and ask really specific questions about the world. A couple years later, Derek gives Stiles his manuscript and it’s the world Stiles made up.

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,500Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 21

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.
